content:
Just wanted to let you know about an open source project to convert HL7 CDA and FHIR to PDF with xml attachement.
https://github.com/maschhoff/HL72PDF
Can we use Mirth Connect as receive CDA - HL7 File and convert it to FHIR and can attach attachments
@Harman Chawla This stream is reserved for general announcements of broad interest. Discussion and questions should be raised on the "implementers" stream
